sentences.sContent: the royalties from his latest book

synos.tran: 皇室；[税收]版税；王权；专利税

remMethod.val: royal(王族的) ＋ ty → 王族(成员)

trans.tranOther: a payment made to the writer of a book or piece of music depending on how many books etc are sold, or to someone whose idea, invention etc is used by someone else to make money
